content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** join my fb group to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns join here 1 the floral crochet triangle bunting pattern is a fun and quick crochet project you can make as many triangles as you d like to create a beautiful crochet garland this crochet garland pattern is fun and festive and will be perfect as a party decoration **you can find the free video tutorial for this pattern here https //youtu be/vfet2hvzziy** **the pdf pattern includes written instructions and a detailed photo tutorial ** - skill level - intermediate - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - hook size needed 3 5 mm / e - the bunting is crocheted with sport #2 weight yarn **total amount of yarn needed ** for 1 triangle 10 grams/25m/27yds for the string 10 grams/25m/27yds **finished size ** triangle 5 5x5 5 14x14 cm triangle if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2023 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up 4 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=1026079&u=2493284&m=72611&urllink=www%2elionbrand%2ecom%2fproducts%2fnuboo%2dyarn&afftrack=irisshrugravelry
